client_id.description: Your azure client or application ID. Defaults to the environment variable AZURE_CLIENT_ID
client_id.title: Client Id

tenant_id.description: The tenant id of the JWT. Defaults to the environment variable AZURE_TENANT_ID
tenant_id.title: Tenant Id

issuer_prefix.description: The issuer prefix of the JWT. Defaults to sts.windows.net.  The tenant id will be appended to this value.  For example, sts.windows.net/your_tenant_id
issuer_prefix.title: Issuer Prefix
